definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Fixed a modifier in the church steeple that was enabling snipers to fire at drastically increased rates.
sentences.chinese: 修正一個使教堂中的狙擊手射速增加的修正倍數。

sentences.english: A team of snipers has been dispatched to save those trapped.
sentences.chinese: 目前，一隊狙擊手已被派往被困地，隨時展開救援。

sentences.english: And some sniper, bastard, started shooting.
sentences.chinese: 然後一些兔崽子狙擊手就開始射擊我們。

sentences.english: The sniper shoots so exactly that no one can escape his shots.
sentences.chinese: 這名狙擊手的槍法很準，沒人能逃過他的狙擊。

sentences.english: He escapes into the elevator just before Lincoln can catch him.
sentences.chinese: 狙擊手逃進了電梯裏，林肯差一點就抓住了他。

sentences.english: The sniper aimed his riffle at the man on the horse.
sentences.chinese: 狙擊手用步槍瞄準了馬背上的那個人。

sentences.english: It showed that the snipers had positioned themselves on the fantail of the Bainbridge.
sentences.chinese: 畫面顯示狙擊手已經在班布里奇的尾突選好了位置。

sentences.english: The hole I strikes the rifle is the sniper special-purpose breaks far to the high accuracy rifle.
sentences.chinese: 孔I擊步槍是狙擊手專用的遠斷離高精度步槍。

sentences.english: An AT Gun by its self is easy meat for a sniper.
sentences.chinese: 一個單獨的反坦克炮簡直就是狙擊手的活靶子。

sentences.english: You're the iper who tried to kill us on that building.
sentences.chinese: 你是那個試圖殺死生化戰場激活碼我們的那個狙擊手。

sentences.english: Armed police are everywhere and there are snipers on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 外面到處是武裝警察，屋頂上還有狙擊手。

sentences.english: They say that Japanese, snipers are an annoyance, little more.
sentences.chinese: 他們說日本狙擊手不過是有些煩人而已。

sentences.english: Passively enhances the range of Kardel s rifle.
sentences.chinese: 被動地增加狙擊手的步槍的射程。

sentences.english: Mahone runs up to the roof and a fight begins.
sentences.chinese: 馬宏向狙擊手所在的樓頂衝上去，一場戰戰開始了。

sentences.english: Snipers have been placed on rooftops and a security fence surrounds the site.
sentences.chinese: 狙擊手在屋頂就位，會場周圍架設了隔離網。

sentences.english: Pro-government snipers reportedly shot two demonstrators dead in Taiz.
sentences.chinese: 據報導，親政府的狙擊手打死兩名示威者。

definition: unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
to charge and break through enemy lines
